column1: Art Institute of Chicago////All in all
column2: I really enjoyed our visit to the Art Institute. The building is gorgeous
column5: a stunning backdrop to the works of art scattered within. There was a nice selection of things to view
column6: a good variety of periods and artists and countries
column8: standout works. I also liked the little cafe on the second floor
column9: where we were able to gulp down a mediocre but VERY welcome cup of coffee.
